adId.title: Ad Identifier
adId.description: Identifier for the ad this event is associated with. Not related to the Ad-ID standard.

runtime.title: Runtime Type
runtime.description: Runtime of the ad unit itself. Not the runtime of the browser or the operating system.

adUnitType.title: Ad Unit Type
adUnitType.description: Identifier for the literal piece of code driving display of the ad in a browser/device.

promotedAssetId.title: Promoted Asset Identifier
promotedAssetId.description: Identifier for the underlying asset being promoted in the ad which this event is associated with.

creativeID.title: Creative Identifier
creativeID.description: Identifier for the creative which this event is associated with.

keywordID.title: Keyword Identifier
keywordID.description: Identifier for the keyword that the surfer used to search, which triggered this click event.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Listing keyword for which customer is bidding

isDynamicSearchAd.title: Is Dynamic Search Advertisement
isDynamicSearchAd.description: Indicates if the click comes from a dynamic search advertisement.

audienceID.title: Audience Identifier
audienceID.description: Identifier for the audience segment for which the ad is targeted.

adGroupID.title: Ad Group Identifier
adGroupID.description: Identifier for the adGroup which ad is displayed and triggered this click event.

campaignID.title: Campaign Identifier
campaignID.description: Identifier for the campaign that belongs to the current displayed advertisement which triggers this click event.

networkType.title: Network Type
networkType.description: Network type the click event came from a search advertisement or content advertisement.

matchType.title: matchType
matchType.description: Match type used to match keyword.
